1   Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said: 2 Dominion and fear are with Her; She maketh peace in Her high places. 3 Is there any number of Her armies? And upon whom doth not Her light arise?
4 How then can woman be just with God? Or how can she be clean that is born of a man? 5 Behold, even the moon hath no brightness, and the stars are not pure in Her sight; 6 How much less woman, that is a worm! and the daughter of woman, that is a maggot!
